mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{divyAddr}, #{divyRequest}, #{tranCode}, sysdate, #{divyDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, TO_CHAR(t.dlvy_date,'YYYYMMDD') dlvy_date, t.order_date, t.tran_no, t.tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no AND tran_no=#{tranNo} ORDER BY TO_CHAR(t.dlvy_date,'YYYYMMDD') DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT * FROM transaction t ORDER BY t.order_date DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT t.receiver_name FROM transaction t ) countTable
